runUnderSudo.description: true if this command should be executed under sudo on linux

commandRoot.description: The first word in the command, e.g. if apt-get install foo, it would be the string apt.

commandParts.description: The remaining parts of the command in an array, for apt-get install {0} it would be [install, {0}] as strings

items.description: a collection of all potential package names for this version of the dotnet sdk on this distro
a collection of all potential package names for this version of the dotnet runtime on this distro
a collection of all potential package names for this version of aspnet on this distro

additionalProperties.description: The Distro name as in cat etc/os-release. Multiple distros are added to the same file.

installCommand.description: The command(s) needed to install dotnet for this distro. Use {0} for the package to install

uninstallCommand.description: The command(s) needed to uninstall dotnet. Use {0} for the package

updateCommand.description: The command(s) needed to update dotnet. Use {0} for the package

searchCommand.description: The command(s) needed to see if a package is available. Use {0} for the package

isInstalledCommand.description: The command(s) needed that will return true if dotnet is installed on the machine

packageLookupCommand.description: The command(s) needed that will return true if a given package is installed on the machine

readSymLinkCommand.description: The command(s) needed that will return true if a given package is installed on the machine

expectedDistroFeedInstallDirectory.description: The path that dotnet would be installed if installed via the distro feed

expectedMicrosoftFeedInstallDirectory.description: The path that dotnet would be installed if installed via the microsoft feed

installedSDKVersionsCommand.description: The command needed to get all installed dotnet sdk versions on the machine

installedRuntimeVersionsCommand.description: The command needed to get all installed dotnet runtime versions on the machine

currentInstallationVersionCommand.description: The command needed to get the version of the installed dotnet on the machine if available

currentInstallPathCommand.description: The command needed to get the path of the installed dotnet on the machine if available

packages.description: Lists all of the packages that MAY be supported or found on the system per each version of .NET

versions.description: The versions of the distro that we support as in etc/os-release or similar. Each one has info on what dotnet versions are supported

items.description: An object representing a version of the distro and which package names it supports

version.description: The distro version mapped to this object

preInstallCommands.description: A set of commands needed to install microsoft package feeds if needed
